text: Diosdado Pangan Macapagal Sr. (September 28, 1910 â€“ April 21, 1997) was the ninth President of the Philippines. He is known for changing the country's Independence Day from July 4 to June 12. June 12 is the day President Emilio Aguinaldo declared independence of the First Philippine Republic from the Spanish Empire in 1898. He is the father of Gloria Macapagal-Arroyo, who was the fourteenth President of the Philippines from 2001 to 2010. ==References== Category:1910 births Category:1997 deaths Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:Anti-communists Category:Filipino lawyers Category:Presidents of the Philippines Category:Vice presidents of the Philippines Category:Filipino Roman Catholics Category:Politicians from Central Luzon
title: Diosdado Macapagal
